name: Citrix-XenServer
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Citrix XenServer is a complete, managed server virtualization platform built on the powerful Xen hypervisor.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<html>\s+<title>XenServer ([^\s^<]+)<\/title>\s+<head>\s+<\/head>\s+<body>\s+<p\/>Citrix Systems, Inc\. XenServer ([^\s]+)\s+<p\/><a href="XenCenter\.iso">XenCenter CD image<\/a>\s+<p\/><a href="XenCenter\.msi">XenCenter installer<\/a>)
